game.description: Embark on a perilous journey to retrieve the fabled Golden Scepter, said to grant immense power to its wielder.
game.objective: Retrieve the Golden Scepter from the ancient ruins of Eldarath.
game.reward: A rare magical amulet granting +10 intelligence and a chest filled with gold coins (100)

tasks.description: Solve the puzzle of the ancient lock to access the Scepter Chamber
tasks.location: Eldarath's Ancient Ruins, Temple of the Moon Goddess
tasks.objective: Unlock the chamber containing the Golden Scepter

tasks.description: Defeat the fearsome Guardian of the Scepter, a powerful undead sorcerer
tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian to claim the Scepter

game.title: The Quest for the Golden Scepter
